items.question: Can I reschedule or cancel my tickets?
items.answer: Yes, in most cases you can reschedule or cancel your tickets up to 24 hours in advance. Please check the specific conditions for your chosen tour or attraction on its product page. Some special events may have different policies.

items.question: How long are open tickets valid?
items.answer: Open tickets, which do not require a specific date and time slot, are typically valid for one year from the date of purchase. We always recommend checking the Details section on the ticket page for the exact validity period.

items.question: What languages do the tour guides speak?
items.answer: Our live guided tours are most commonly offered in English and the local language. Many tours also offer audio guides in multiple languages, including Spanish, French, German, Italian, and more. The available languages are always listed on the product page.

items.question: Is my booking confirmed instantly?
items.answer: Yes, most of our bookings are confirmed instantly after a successful payment. You will receive a booking confirmation email with your tickets and all necessary information right away.

items.question: Do I need to print my ticket?
items.answer: No. All our tickets are mobile-friendly. You can simply show the e-ticket on your smartphone or tablet to the tour guide or at the entrance.

items.question: What happens if my tour is canceled by the operator?
items.answer: In the rare event that a tour is canceled by the operator due to unforeseen circumstances, we will notify you immediately and provide a full refund or help you find a suitable alternative.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: The price you see on the product page is the final price. It includes all taxes and fees unless otherwise stated.

items.question: Can I pay with a different currency?
items.answer: Yes, our website supports multiple currencies. You can change your preferred currency at the top of the page.

items.question: Are the tours accessible for people with disabilities?
items.answer: Accessibility varies by tour. We provide detailed information on each product page. If you have specific needs, contact support before booking.

items.question: What should I bring on my tour?
items.answer: We generally recommend comfortable shoes, a water bottle, and weather-appropriate clothing. See the product page for specific recommendations.
